meanings.definition: Lasting for a very short time
meanings.sent1: The beauty of the sunset was ephemerally captivating.
meanings.sent2: The flowers in the garden bloomed ephemerally in the morning light.
meanings.sent3: The ephemerally delicious ice cream melted too quickly on the hot day.
meanings.sent4: Her happiness was as ephemerally fleeting as a shooting star.
meanings.sent5: The ephemerally changing colors of the chameleon amazed the children.

meanings.definition: Existing or continuing for a day only
meanings.sent1: The ephemerally exciting fair was a one-day event.
meanings.sent2: The ephemerally short-lived festival brought joy to the town.
meanings.sent3: The ephemerally open pop-up shop closed before I could visit.
meanings.sent4: The ephemerally bright fireworks lit up the night sky for a moment.
meanings.sent5: The ephemerally available limited edition sneakers sold out instantly.

meanings.sent1: The ephemerally passing clouds obscured the sun briefly.
meanings.sent2: The ephemerally quick rain shower left the streets wet.
meanings.sent3: The ephemerally short meeting ended before any decisions were made.
meanings.sent4: The ephemerally brief pause in the music added suspense to the performance.
meanings.sent5: The ephemerally swift rabbit darted across the field.
